definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: He had been translating and somehow or other, the tape machine malfunctioned.
sentences.chinese: 他一直在翻譯而不知怎的磁帶機出故障了。

sentences.english: Additionally support is delivered for HP tape drives with built-in data encryption.
sentences.chinese: 此外支持是惠普磁帶機內置式數據加密。
